Function reference

version 3.0.0.1000

Models

Supported Time Series Processes

Create an Autoregressive P [AR(P)] Process

  • AR

Create an Autoregressive 1 [AR(1)] Process

  • AR1

Create an Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average (ARIMA) Process

  • ARIMA

Create an Autoregressive Moving Average (ARMA) Process

  • ARMA

Create an Autoregressive Order 1 - Moving Average Order 1 (ARMA(1,1)) Process

  • ARMA11

Create an Drift (DR) Process

  • DR

Create a Gauss-Markov (GM) Process

  • GM

Create an Moving Average Q [MA(Q)] Process

  • MA

Create an Moving Average 1 [MA(1)] Process

  • MA1

Create an Quantisation Noise (QN) Process

  • QN

Create an Random Walk (RW) Process

  • RW

Create a Seasonal Autoregressive Integrated Moving Average (SARIMA) Process

  • SARIMA

Create a Seasonal Autoregressive Moving Average (SARMA) Process

  • SARMA

Create an White Noise (WN) Process

  • WN

GMWM Estimator

Estimation Tools for the Generalized Method of Wavelet Moments estimator (GMWM)

GMWM for (Robust) Sensor

  • gmwm_imu

Generalized Method of Wavelet Moments (GMWM) for IMUs, ARMA, SSM, and Robust

  • gmwm

GMWM for Robust/Classical Comparison

  • rgmwm

Update GMWM object for sensor, ARMA, SSM, and Robust

  • update.gmwm

Model Selection

Rank a group of models by using the Wavelet Information Criterion (WIC)

Automatically select appropriate model for IMU

  • auto_imu

Automatically select appropriate model for a set of models

  • rank_models

Tools for computing information

Calculate the Allan Variance

  • avar

Brickwall functionality for MO/DWT

  • brickwall

Discrete Wavelet Transform

  • dwt

Calculate the Hadamard Variance

  • hadam

Maximum Overlap Discrete Wavelet Transform

  • modwt

Wavelet Variance

  • wvar
  • wvar.default
  • wvar.gts
  • wvar.imu
  • wvar.lts
  • wvar.ts

Calculate the Asymptotic Covariance Matrix

  • wvcov

Generation

Support for Generating Single or Composite Processes

Create a GMWM TS Object based on model

  • gen_gts

Generate Latent Time Series Object Based on Model

  • gen_lts

  • imu

Graphing Features

  • autoplot.hadam

  • compare_eff

Graphically Compare GMWM Model Fit

  • compare_models

Compare Wavelet Variances

  • compare_wvar

Wrapper to Automatic Model Selection Results of IMU Object

  • plot.auto.imu

Wrapper to ggplot Allan Variance Graph

  • plot.avar

Wrapper to Graph Solution of the Generalized Method of Wavelet Moments

  • plot.gmwm

Plot Time Series Data

  • plot.gts

Wrapper to ggplot Hadamard Variance Graph

  • plot.hadam

Wrapper Function to Plot the Graph of Latent Time Series

  • plot.lts

  • plot.rank.models

Wrapper to ggplot Wavelet Variances Graph

  • plot.wvar

  • install_datapkg

Process to Haar Wavelet Variance

Functions that compute the theoretical Haar Wavelet Variance

AR(1) process to WV

  • ar1_to_wv

ARMA process to WV

  • arma_to_wv

ARMA(1,1) to WV

  • arma11_to_wv

Drift to WV

  • dr_to_wv

Moving Average Order 1 (MA(1)) to WV

  • ma1_to_wv

Quantisation Noise (QN) to WV

  • qn_to_wv

Random Walk to WV

  • rw_to_wv

Gaussian White Noise to WV

  • wn_to_wv

Partial First Order Derivatives

Functions that compute the partial first order derivatives of the theoretical Haar Wavelet Variance

Analytic D matrix for AR(1) process

  • deriv_ar1

Analytic D matrix for ARMA(1,1) process

  • deriv_arma11

Analytic D matrix for Drift (DR) Process

  • deriv_dr

Analytic D matrix for MA(1) process

  • deriv_ma1

Analytic D matrix for Quantization Noise (QN) Process

  • deriv_qn

Analytic D matrix Random Walk (RW) Process

  • deriv_rw

Analytic D Matrix for a Gaussian White Noise (WN) Process

  • deriv_wn

Analytic D matrix of Processes

  • derivative_first_matrix

Partial Second Order Derivatives

Functions that compute the partial second order derivatives of the theoretical Haar Wavelet Variance

Analytic second derivative matrix for AR(1) process

  • deriv_2nd_ar1

Analytic D matrix for ARMA(1,1) process

  • deriv_2nd_arma11

Analytic second derivative matrix for drift process

  • deriv_2nd_dr

Analytic second derivative for MA(1) process

  • deriv_2nd_ma1
